inclusion.criterion: Subjects enrolled in this study will include patients presenting to the emergency department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with a diagnosis of soft tissue abscess.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to provide written consent/ assent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Incision and drainage to be performed by ED physician
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pilonidal cyst, genital or perirectal abscess
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy showing pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
